sys_script_include.name: grabLocation

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_81ef819993960210cf9d7b732bba1046
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1119662_loaner_v.grabLocation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Automatically gets office location</description><name>grabLocation</name><script><![CDATA[var grabLocation = Class.create();
grabLocation.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	locationDetail: function() {
		
        var location = ''; 
		var userId	= this.getParameter("sysparm_user_sysid");
		
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.addQuery("sys_user_sysid", userid);
		gr.addQuery(); 
		
        if (gr.next()) {
			location =  gr.getValue('location'); 
			
		}    
          
        return location;
    },

    type: 'grabLocation'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-20 04:34:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>81ef819993960210cf9d7b732bba1046</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>grabLocation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request & Inventory" source="x_1119662_loaner_v">6f3e527a93310210cf9d7b732bba109a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request & Inventory">6f3e527a93310210cf9d7b732bba109a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_81ef819993960210cf9d7b732bba1046</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-20 04:53:52</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
